titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that Federal funding for vocational education should be continued.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.
Referred to Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

bill.summary: 3/25/1987--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that the Federal Government should continue its role in promoting vocational education by continuing to provide the States with vocational education grants.
